classes.name: TrackerId
classes.docstring: Uniquely identifying string provided to the build tracker.

classes.name: BuildTracker
classes.docstring:
Ensure that an sdist cannot request itself as a setup requirement.

When an sdist is prepared, it identifies its setup requirements in the
context of ``BuildTracker.track()``. If a requirement shows up recursively, this
raises an exception.

This stops fork bombs embedded in malicious packages.

methods.name: add
methods.docstring: Add an InstallRequirement to build tracking.

methods.name: remove
methods.docstring: Remove an InstallRequirement from build tracking.

methods.name: track
methods.docstring:
Ensure that `key` cannot install itself as a setup requirement.

:raises LookupError: If `key` was already provided in a parent invocation of
                     the context introduced by this method.

functions.docstring: Add an InstallRequirement to build tracking.

functions.docstring:
Ensure that `key` cannot install itself as a setup requirement.

:raises LookupError: If `key` was already provided in a parent invocation of
                     the context introduced by this method.
